title: We have a tremendous desire for Aushin. When is it coming out PLS?
body: Riot pretty please, Aushin is like the dream of us, would you please tell us when he is coming out?

replies.body: Thank you man, it helped a lot. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

~~Maybe 2014~~
~~I have a good feeling about 2015~~
2016, most definitely!

In all seriousness, Ao Shin is a work in progress, and Riot will give an update when they get close on releasing the champion. 

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Ao_Shin
